lead_paragraph: Jimmy Walker had champagne in his glass and the Wanamaker Trophy at his side. Still unopened is a bottle of Chateau Margaux that Butch Harmon has kept in his Las Vegas wine cellar for such a moment as this.

headline.print_headline: Walker Delivers on Coach Butch Harmon's Belief of a Major
headline.main: Walker Delivers on Coach Butch Harmon's Belief of a Major

snippet: Jimmy Walker had champagne in his glass and the Wanamaker Trophy at his side. Still unopened is a bottle of Chateau Margaux that Butch Harmon has kept in his Las Vegas wine cellar for such a moment as this....
